long_desc.thetext: Miles, can you elaborate what the implications for existing extensions of the Reviews framework are?

There shouldn't be any for the initial implementation as consumers can continue to manage the reviews model themselves and we won't be changing the model. However, consumers may wish to extend the editor implementation following the general pattern of the Gerrit implementation. R4E will eventually be doing that, but for now there is a separate editor implementation.
